s: Inicia sesión en tu consola de publicidad y haz clic en “Brand Store”. Comienza a crear tu Brand Store con el Generador de Stores de autoservicio de Amazon.

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 3 days ago - The company launched in 2005 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and served multiple areas across the Middle East. On March 28, 2017, Amazon acquired Souq.com for $580 million. The company was re-branded as Amazon and its infrastructure was used to expand Amazon's online platform in the Middle East.

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Amazon Brand Registry is a free program that helps you protect and grow your brand, even if you don’t sell in the Amazon store.

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Vender en Amazon
s: Registra tu marca en Amazon Brand Registry para desbloquear herramientas diseñadas para proteger y crear tu marca, lo que ofrecerá una mejor experiencia para los clientes de Amazon.

t: Launch your brand with Amazon.in
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to become eligible to activate a suite of brand-building tools and protection benefits.
